frontmatter.title: Pale Blue Dot

nodes.excerpt: Look again at that dot. That’s here. That’s home. That’s us. On it everyone you love, everyone you know, everyone you ever heard of, every…
The view of the earth from the moon fascinated me - a small disk, 240,000 mniles away. It was hard to think that that little thing held so…
